name: The Deep Sorrow
description:
Controls: [Left Mouse] on the stars to select them.  [Q] Exit game

You play as a man with deep sorrow in his life. To save himself he must find the better memories, to save himself he must remember.

(Use windows version for the best experience)

Design: Alexander Ponomarov

Art: Kateryna Hnativ

Music: Clement Panchout
